text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

text: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

text: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Good Morning! Start your day with a positive mindset.
author: Unknown

text: Every morning is a new beginning. Embrace it.
author: Unknown

text: Rise up, start fresh, see the bright opportunity in each day.
author: Unknown

text: Good Night! Let the stars light your dreams.
author: Unknown

text: Sleep well and wake up with determination.
author: Unknown

text: Night is a reminder that there is always light after darkness.
author: Unknown

text: God never gives up on you, so don’t give up on yourself.
author: Unknown

text: Good Morning! The best way to start your day is with gratitude.
author: Unknown

text: God’s love is bigger than any problem you face.
author: Unknown

text: Good Night! May your dreams be peaceful and your rest be sweet.
author: Unknown

text: Start your morning with prayer, and your day will be blessed.
author: Unknown

text: Faith can move mountains. Trust in God.
author: Bible
